name: Brief Sensation Seeking Scale Survey
description: A self-report measure of sensation seeking, a dispositional risk factor for various problem behaviors.
instructions: For each of the following statements, please indicate whether you agree or disagree with them, and how strongly.
reference: Hoyle, R., Stephenson, M., Palmgreen, P., Lorch, E., & Donohew, R. (2002). Reliability and validity of a brief measure of sensation seeking. Personality and Individual Differences, 32(3), 401â€“414. https://doi.org/10.1016/S0191-8869(01)00032-0
